00028 struct CellIDRequest {
00030    MC2String m_mcc;
00032    MC2String m_mnc;
00034    MC2String m_lac;
00036    MC2String m_cellID;
00037 
00038    // Optional stuff that isnt supported or needed yet.
00040    MC2String m_networkType;
00042    MC2String m_signalStrength;
00043    
00044    // rnc id not to be used? it is a part of building up a cell id for a 3G
00045    // network. A so called UC-ID (3G UTRAN Cell ID)
00046    MC2String m_rncId;
00047 };
00048 
00050 struct CellIDReply {
00051    // Maybe radius should be MAX_UINT32 instead
00052    CellIDReply() :
00053       m_outerRadius( 1000 ),
00054       m_innerRadius( 0 ),
00055       m_altitude( 0 ),
00056       m_startAngle( 0 ),
00057       m_endAngle( 360 )
00058    {}
00059 
00061    MC2Coordinate m_coord;
00062 
00064    uint32 m_outerRadius;
00065 
00066    // For possible future use
00068    uint32 m_innerRadius;
00069 
00071    int32 m_altitude;
00072 
00074    uint16 m_startAngle;
00075 
00077    uint16 m_endAngle;
00078 
00080    MC2String m_errorStr;
00081 };
